about_the_game: This is a hint book for Pierre's Adventures in French. It does not include the original game. This book will help you solve the most difficult puzzles. It's in French with helpful pictures. Purchasing this DLC is a great way to support the developers of Pierre's Adventures in French.
detailed_description: This is a hint book for Pierre's Adventures in French. It does not include the original game. This book will help you solve the most difficult puzzles. It's in French with helpful pictures. Purchasing this DLC is a great way to support the developers of Pierre's Adventures in French.

Recommended:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
